item.description:
Hello everyone.

Thank you for all you interests in gathering for a tennis meet up.
I have looked into an area in west medford that has 5 courts new outdoor courts
that will hopefully accomodate us?

It is located on the mystic river.
I have tried to link a map to this site but am unable so :

If you proceed off rt. 93 north and take the Mystic Vally Parkway exit toward medford/ Arlington you will eventually reach boston avenue. ( where Tufts is located ) if you proceed straight through mystic vally Parkway there will be a rotary stay right of the rotary and continue on mystic vally prkway this is Arlington roughly 1/4 mile there will be agulf station and a set of lights take a right at the light and go over the bridge to your right will be a basketball court and then the 5 courts tis street is Mystic River Road.

hope all can make it
bring your rackets and volly together

( this is the third time I have typed this message !! I hope you get it this site keeps freezing everytime I type a link )

I really hope all can meke it and meet up with a few tennis partners!!
Look foward to meeting more tennis partners myself

if any questions please feel free to email me at laf620@rcn.com

hope the weather hold out
if not I will canel due to the rain if any
but I am hoping for sunny skys and meetin all

Laura
item.name: 5 outdoor courts ?? ANY ONE GAME ! time any time after 4:30 till dark??
